objects.text:
• Multiple Drying Modes
• Energy-Efficient Technology
• Digital LED Controls
• Perfect for Any Space

product_details.name: Insignia Ultra-Modern High-Efficiency Ventless Dryer - Smart Home Essential
product_details.description:
• ✨ Sleek white modern design with large digital display and intuitive controls
• 🎯 Multiple drying modes: My Cycle, Mixed Load, Heavy Duty, Towels, and more
• ⚡ Energy-efficient ventless condensing technology
• 🔧 Easy-access maintenance panel and clear maintenance instructions
• 📱 Digital LED display with time remaining and cycle status
• 🌟 Large capacity drum with dark glass door for visibility
• 💨 Advanced moisture sensing for precise drying results
• ⚙️ Adjustable temperature settings for various fabric types
• 🔄 Reversible door design for flexible installation
• 💡 User-friendly control panel with rotating selector dial
• 🏠 Perfect for apartments, condos, and spaces without external venting

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and energetic promotional design for a home appliance. The background includes soft waves and abstract circular elements creating a sense of motion. The layout is divided into distinct sections: the upper part uses objects like `heading` and `subheading` to highlight urgency in bold, contrasting fonts; while the `tagline` subtly emphasizes the product category. The midsection includes `description`, a bulleted list of key features set to the left. The product image `product_image` is prominently placed to the right. At the bottom, the pricing is bold with `price`, supported by an action-driven button (`cta_background` and `cta`) and a sense of urgency through `urgency_text`.

**Color Palette:**
- Light Blue: `#EFF3F6`, `#D9E5F1`, `#B8D0E6`
- Navy Blue: `#2D5D86`
- Accent Red: `#E74C3C`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
- Muted Blue/Circles: `#4A7CA6`
product_color: The product image features a sleek and modern color palette dominated by clean white (#F8F9FA) and deep black (#1A1A1A), creating a high-contrast, professional look. The white body of the dryer gives it a fresh, hygienic appeal, while the black door provides a bold focal point, enhancing visual interest. Subtle accent lights in the control panel introduce minimal touches of soft blue (#A9D0F5) and red (#FF6B6B), used to differentiate settings effectively. These colors are not overpowering but add a crisp hint of technology and usability. For an ad banner, this minimalist palette can reinforce the appliance’s premium and efficient image.
